trans-unit.source: Represents a security key that is generated using the RSA algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified RSA algorithm.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that represents an RSA algorithm.
rsa is `null`.
Decrypts the specified encrypted key.
The cryptographic algorithm that was used to encrypt the key.
The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the encrypted key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the decrypted key.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
keyData is `null`.
Encrypts the specified key using the specified algorithm.
The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key with.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the encrypted key.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
keyData is `null`.
Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
The asymmetric algorithm to create.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
requiresPrivateKey is `true` and a private key is not available.
Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
The hash algorithm.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.
`true` when the private key is available; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
The cryptographic algorithm.
`true` when the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
The cryptographic algorithm.

`true` when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
The cryptographic algorithm.
`true` when the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the size, in bits, of the key.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed.
It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
The size, in bits, of the key.
